Class GraphicalInterface

java.lang.Object
  GraphicalInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interface
public class GraphicalInterface
extends Object
implements Interface

Provides the GUI of the Cinema Booking System. Different buttons provide access to the data in the system. It builds and displays the application GUI and initialises all other components.

Version:
01.11.10
Author:
Fariha Nazmul
